GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.14 to before v4.19.268
GSD.description:
net: phy: fix null-ptr-deref while probe() failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.268 by commit 0744c7be4de564db03e24527b2e096b7e0e20972, it was introduced in version v2.6.14 by commit e13934563db047043ccead26412f552375cea90c. For more details please see the references link.
